update t_au_menu
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from T_AU_MENU WHERE IS_DELETED = 0
AND NAME LIKE "%"#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
